posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for: Moderator.
2) Your age: 13
3) Your location: (Usa, Central)
4) Current In-Game Name: [NNJG]General Falcon
5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community Profile: STEAM_:0:1:31731522     http://steamcommunity.com/id/littlekris
6) How did you find out about NNJG: Random Search.
7) How long have you been involved with NNJG and/or Shadow's servers:I've Been a member of NNJG for about 1 year and played about 6-7 months of that time.
8) What you can bring to the NNJG Team: Moderation.
9) Why do you want to be part of the NNJG Team: I truly love this server out of all my Favorite servers and because i believe i can help out with Troll's and More.
10) Do you have any past experience with the position you're applying for:No, I do not have any past Experience.
11) Do you own a decent microphone, and do you frequently utilize it: Yes, I do own a decent and proper Microphone but i rarely use it.
12) Any other comments or information you can provide: This Server is one of the best because you can see when it started out it had turned into a great community. I will most likely be more active i had just been on and off because of computer problems not sure what it was but it hasnt happened so far and im hoping its fixed.
